text: Sir Simon David Jenkins FSA FRSL (born 10 June 1943) is a British author, newspaper columnist and editor. == Education == Jenkins went to Mill Hill School. He graduated from St John's College, Oxford, where he read Philosophy, Politics and Economics. == References == Category:Living people Category:1943 births Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:British bloggers Category:English journalists Category:British editors Category:Writers from Birmingham
title: Simon Jenkins
